resources.textures

Interface Texture2D

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Resource, Texture
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    EasyFiltering
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DynamicTexture2D, StaticCubeMapTexture, StaticTexture, StaticTexture2D

    public interface Texture2D
extends Texture
    Interface for the standard 2D textures.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface resources.textures.Texture

        Texture.TextureFilter, Texture.TextureFilterType, Texture.TextureWrap, Texture.TextureWrapDirection
